bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks
Part 15.4: Low-Rate Wireless Personal Area Networks (LR-WPANs)
Amendment 6: TV White Space Between 54 MHz and 862 MHz Physical Layer
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks - Part 15.4: Low-Rate Wireless Personal Area Networks (LR-WPANs) - Amendment 6: TV White Space Between 54 MHz and 862 MHz Physical Layer
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.15.4m-2014 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4-2011 as amended by IEEE Std 802.15.4e-2012, IEEE Std 802.15.4f-2012, IEEE Std 802.15.4g-2012, IEEE Std 802.15.4j-2013, and IEEE Std 802.15.4k-2013)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: In this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4(TM)-2011, outdoor low-data-rate, wireless, television white space (TVWS) network requirements are addressed. Alternate physical layers (PHYs) are defined as well as only the medium access control (MAC) modifications needed to support their implementation.

In this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4(TM)-2011, outdoor low-data-rate, wireless, television white space (TVWS) network requirements are addressed. Alternate physical layers (PHYs) are defined as well as only the medium access control (MAC) modifications needed to support their implementation.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
